examples.example: 这首歌真的很好听，让人陶醉其中。

translate.english: This song is really very nice to listen to and makes people intoxicated in it.

examples.example: 她的声音非常好听，犹如黄鹂鸟的歌声般悦耳动听。

translate.english: Her voice is very pleasant to listen to, just like the singing of an oriole.

examples.example: 她口中说出的每一句话都那么好听，让人如沐春风。

translate.english: Every word she utters is so pleasant to the ear, making people feel like bathing in the spring breeze.
